title: Do You Shred in Bend? Join the 10 Barrel Brewing Riding Solo Series Before It’s Too Late
content:
If you ride in the Bend, Oregon area, you’re gonna want to check this out. 10 Barrel Brewing’s Riding Solo Series is a group of “low-key, high-fun” stage races held between October 10th-Nov 6th. Each week features a different course, you can run each course as many times as you’d like during the week, and

The post Do You Shred in Bend? Join the 10 Barrel Brewing Riding Solo Series Before It’s Too Late appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Andrew Marshall
